org.jboss.windup.reporting.config.classification

Interface ClassificationLink

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Operation, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Classification

    public interface ClassificationLink
extends org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder
    Step of the classification to specify more links or effort (effort is the last option).
    Author:
    Matej Briskar, Ondrej Zizka

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClassificationLink with(Link link)
      Specify the link describing the topic more precisely.
      ClassificationEffort withEffort(int effort)
      Specify the effort that needs to be done in order to face the issue.
      ClassificationTags withTags(Set<String> tags)
      Specify the link describing the topic more precisely.

    • Method Detail

      • with

        ClassificationLink with(Link link)
        Specify the link describing the topic more precisely.
        Parameters:
        link - the Link describing the topic more precisely
        Returns:
        next step of Classification definition to specify effort

      • withTags

        ClassificationTags withTags(Set<String> tags)
        Specify the link describing the topic more precisely.
        Parameters:
        link - the Link describing the topic more precisely
        Returns:
        next step of Classification definition to specify effort

      • withEffort

        ClassificationEffort withEffort(int effort)
        Specify the effort that needs to be done in order to face the issue. Use this only if you don't want to specify any extra link.
        Parameters:
        effort - Effort needed to be put. Will be used to count story points for the whole application.
        Returns:
        finish the Classification definition
